General.Name: Mitre Realty Empreendimentos e Participações S.A
General.Description: Mitre Realty Empreendimentos e Participações S.A., together with its subsidiaries engages in the development, construction, and sale of residential and commercial real estate properties. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Sao Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Alameda Santos, No. 700, Sao Paulo, SP, Brazil, 01418-100
